title: Enhancing Business Practical Competencies: Effective Language Learning Design in Emergency Remote Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: The learner can complete weekly language practice assignments twice a week based on clear task instructions in an emergency remote environment
The learner can submit at least three revised versions of assignments using peer feedback on digital platforms
The learner can accurately describe at least 90% of methods for self-resolving technical issues encountered during the language learning process
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
